thread.title: John Thomlinson
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by John Thomlinson

author: John Thomlinson
title: John Thomlinson
text: The book was recorded as delivered by USPS, but there was no book left at my apartment. I contacted Thrift Books (their Second City brand) to ask them to let me know if it was sent back to them. Without hesitating, they sent me another copy. I could not be happier with this seller. (And if USPS ever finds the one they "delivered", I'll send it back.)
